    Subinterfaces of LogFilter in com.dua3.utility.logging
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    LogEntryFilter
    Deprecated.
    Classes in com.dua3.utility.logging that implement LogFilter
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    DefaultLogEntryFilter
    The DefaultLogEntryFilter class is an implementation of the LogEntryFilter interface that filters log entries based on their log level and a user-defined filter.
    class 
    StandardLogFilter
    The LogFilter class is an implementation of the LogEntryFilter interface that filters log entries based on their name and log levels defined on package/class levels.
    Fields in com.dua3.utility.logging declared as LogFilter
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final LogFilter
    LogFilter.ALL_PASS_FILTER
    A LogEntryFilter that allows all log entries to pass through.
